title: bart tokenizer对special token的处理和hf有diff
body:
```python
from paddlenlp.transformers import BartTokenizer
from transformers import BartTokenizer as hf_BartTokenizer

model = 'bart-base'
tokenizer = BartTokenizer.from_pretrained(model)

hf_tokenizer = hf_BartTokenizer.from_pretrained('facebook/'+model)

sentence = "I love that girl, but <mask> does not <mask> me."

print(tokenizer.tokenize(sentence))
print(hf_tokenizer.tokenize(sentence))
```
```shell
# 对不齐的输出
paddlenlp
['I', 'Ġlove', 'Ġthat', 'Ġgirl', ',', 'Ġbut', '<mask>', 'does', 'Ġnot', '<mask>', 'me', '.']

hf
['I', 'Ġlove', 'Ġthat', 'Ġgirl', ',', 'Ġbut', '<mask>', 'Ġdoes', 'Ġnot', '<mask>', 'Ġme', '.']
```
paddlenlp==2.2.6可以对齐，paddlenlp>=2.3.0rc0对不齐

title: Fix bert offset mapping issues
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
Bug fixes
### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
APIs
### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
### Bug 出现原因：
1. Python版本OffsetMapping功能原理：
1.1  使用bert tokenizer 将raw_text切成若干个token（保存在`split_tokens`中，切词中也使用了去除标点等clean_text操作）
1.2  将raw_text遍历每个字符并转换为normalized_text，记录raw_text 中每个char与normalized_text的每个char的映射关系（保存在`char_mapping`中，转换中使用了去除标点等clean_text操作，该clean_text操作必须与1.1的clean_text保持一致）
1.3  遍历`split_tokens`中的每个token，根据`char_mapping` 构造 offset_mapping。
2. Bert等Wordpiece类Tokenizer在切词时**必然**会做去除标点等clean_text，并且会使用`do_lower_case`判断是否进行大小写转换操作；
3. 原offset mapping实现中（1.2步所示），在clean_text中去除标点的操作是经过`do_lower_case`这一flag控制的，这使得在`do_lower_case`为False时，1.1与1.2步的操作有diff，导致get_offset_mapping运行失败。ERNIE中文模型的Tokenizer的`do_lower_case`均为True，而Bert中文模型Tokenizer的`do_lower_case`均为False。所以在ERNIE模型中运行正常，而在BERT模型中运行失败。

### Description

新增层次分类算法，包含训练，预测，静态图导出，裁剪等算法，支持paddle serving， triton， onnxruntime多种部署方式。

以下是本项目主要代码结构及说明：

```text
hierarchical_classification/
├── deploy # 部署
│   └── onnxruntime # 导出ONNX模型并基于ONNXRuntime部署

│   │   └──service.py # 层次分类任务启动服务端的脚本

│               └── config.pbtxt
├── train.py # 训练评估脚本
├── predict.py # 预测脚本
├── export_model.py # 动态图参数导出静态图参数脚本
├── utils.py # 工具函数脚本
├── metric.py # metric脚本
├── prune.py # 裁剪脚本

├── prune_config.py # 裁剪训练参数配置
├── requirements.txt # 环境依赖
└── README.md # 使用说明
```

title: UIE关系抽取不能同时处理多个相同关系?
body:
如下简单案例:

```
from pprint import pprint
from paddlenlp import Taskflow

schema = {'竞赛名称': ['主办方']}  # Define the schema for relation extraction
ie = Taskflow('information_extraction', schema=schema, device_id=-1)
pprint(ie('2021语言与智能技术竞赛由中国中文信息学会主办，2022语言与智能技术竞赛由中国计算机学会联合主办，'))
```

输出为:

```
[{'竞赛名称': [{'end': 38,
            'probability': 0.5442695683933891,
            'relations': {'主办方': [{'end': 46,
                                   'probability': 0.6688052744704507,
                                   'start': 39,
                                   'text': '中国计算机学会'},
                                  {'end': 22,
                                   'probability': 0.3612593523338319,
                                   'start': 14,
                                   'text': '中国中文信息学会'}]},
            'start': 25,
            'text': '2022语言与智能技术竞赛'},
           {'end': 13,
            'probability': 0.6462262719238332,
            'relations': {'主办方': [{'end': 22,
                                   'probability': 0.740973401950825,
                                   'start': 14,
                                   'text': '中国中文信息学会'},
                                  {'end': 46,
                                   'probability': 0.44487079885126946,
                                   'start': 39,
                                   'text': '中国计算机学会'}]},
            'start': 0,
            'text': '2021语言与智能技术竞赛'}]}]
```

这里的问题我的理解是,  因为有两个竞赛名称的主体: `2021语言与智能技术竞赛` 和 `2022语言与智能技术竞赛`

当使用 `竞赛名称的主办方` 作为promt时, 没有指明是哪个竞赛名称,  导致每个主体都预测出来两个主办方.

不知道我理解的是否正确, 请问有比较好的解决办法吗? 谢谢!

body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
Bug fixes
### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Models
### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
Fix load ckpt weight for amp 02

在 amp-o2功能开发过程中，为了支持指定网络存储数据类型的功能，添加state_dict hook功能，但是在Layer的set_state_dict是通过state_dict获取网络参数并加载的，hook接口的存在导致 set_state_dict无法加载到原本网络参数。

导致参数加载出现问题。本PR不再使用 save_dtype 选项。

https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/pull/43407

title: [Dygraph] Support sharding stage2/3+dp in GPT-3 model
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
Bug fixes
### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Others
### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
[Dygraph] Support sharding stage2/3+dp in GPT-3 model

一、GPT-3精度对比（单机8卡FP16训练1w后的loss）：
| strategy             | loss        |
| -------------------- | ----------- |
| dp8                  | 6.553567886 |
| sharding8(stage2)    | 6.553497314 |
| sharding8(stage3)    | 6.553690910 |
| dp2sharding4(stage2) | 6.553609848 |
| dp2sharding4(stage3) | 6.553627491 |

二、适配Demo
```python
import paddle
from paddle.fluid.dygraph.nn import Linear
from paddle.distributed import fleet
from paddle.vision.models import ResNet
from paddle.vision.models.resnet import BasicBlock

###### 1.引入依赖包
from paddle.distributed.sharding import group_sharded_parallel
from paddle.fluid.dygraph.parallel import sync_params_buffers
from paddle.distributed.fleet.utils.hybrid_parallel_util import fused_allreduce_gradients
######

sharding_stage = 3 # or 2
dp_degree = 2
mp_degree = 1
pp_degree = 1
sharding_degree = 4
use_pure_fp16 = True
level = "p_g_os" if sharding_stage == 3 else "os_g"

###### 2.初始化分布式环境
strategy = fleet.DistributedStrategy()
strategy.hybrid_configs = {
    "dp_degree": dp_degree,
    "mp_degree": mp_degree,
    "pp_degree": pp_degree,
    "sharding_degree": sharding_degree
}
fleet.init(is_collective=True, strategy=strategy)
hcg = fleet.get_hybrid_communicate_group()
dp_group = hcg.get_data_parallel_group()
sharding_group = hcg.get_sharding_parallel_group()
######

if sharding_stage in [2, 3]:
    assert mp_degree == pp_degree == 1, "sharding stage2/3 will support tensor/pipeline parallel later"

model = ResNet(BasicBlock, 18)
clip = paddle.nn.ClipGradByGlobalNorm(clip_norm=1.0)
optimizer = paddle.optimizer.AdamW(learning_rate=0.001, parameters=model.parameters(), weight_decay=0.00001, grad_clip=clip)
scaler = None

if use_pure_fp16:
    scaler = paddle.amp.GradScaler(init_loss_scaling=32768)
    model = paddle.amp.decorate(
        models=model,
        level='O2',
        save_dtype='float32')

###### 3.dp通信组内广播参数，然后用sharding api封装
if dp_degree > 1:
    sync_params_buffers(model, comm_group=dp_group, src_rank=dp_group.ranks[0])

model, optimizer, scaler = group_sharded_parallel(model, optimizer, level=level, scaler=scaler, group=sharding_group)
######
# 如何继续训练？

for step_id in range(1, 100):
    x = paddle.rand([1, 3, 224, 224])
    with paddle.amp.auto_cast(
        use_pure_fp16, custom_black_list=[
            "reduce_sum",
            "c_softmax_with_cross_entropy",
            "elementwise_div"], level='O2'):
        out = model(x)
    loss = out.mean()
    if use_pure_fp16:
        scaler.scale(loss).backward()
    else:
        loss.backward()
    
    print("=== step_id : {}    loss : {}".format(step_id, loss.numpy()))

    ###### 4.优化器计算前在dp通信组内进行梯度同步
    if sharding_stage in [2, 3] and dp_degree > 1:
        fused_allreduce_gradients(model.parameters(), hcg)
        if sharding_stage == 3:
            for p in model.parameters():
                if hasattr(p, "bw_storage"):
                    assert p.grad is None, "This case shouldn't happen."
                    p.bw_storage.scale_(1.0 / dp_group.nranks)
                    paddle.distributed.all_reduce(p.bw_storage, group=dp_group)
    ######

    if use_pure_fp16:
        scaler.step(optimizer)
        scaler.update()
    else:
        optimizer.step()
    optimizer.clear_grad()

# stage3: param save
# stageX: optimizer. save
# Load。 group_shard 之前load.

```

title: add Web of Science(WOS) dataset(a hierarchical text classification dataset)
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
Others

### PR changes
APIs 

### Description
Add a common hierarchical text classification dataset, Web of Science(WOS). The dataset source comes from [Web of Science](https://data.mendeley.com/datasets/9rw3vkcfy4/2) and was preprocessed referring to [HiAGM](https://github.com/Alibaba-NLP/HiAGM). WOS dataset include 7 major domains and 134 subdomains with  46,985  text sequences of published paper.

We can read WOS dataset with the following code: 
```
from paddlenlp.datasets import load_dataset
train_ds, dev_ds, test_ds = load_dataset('wos', splits=["train", "dev", "test"])
```
dataset example:
```
{'sentence': 'experiments in assisted living confirm that such systems can provide context-aware services that enable occupants to remain active and independent. they also demonstrate that abnormal sensor events hamper the correct identification of critical (and potentially life-threatening) situations, and that existing learning, estimation, and time-based approaches are inaccurate and inflexible when applied to multiple people sharing a living space. we propose a technique that integrates the semantics of sensor readings with statistical outlier detection. we evaluate the technique against four real-world datasets that include multiple individuals, and show consistent rates of anomaly detection across different environments.', 'label': [4, 68]} 
```

title: fix bug of offset overlapping
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
Bug fixes
### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
APIs
### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
修复prompt为英文时，prompt与text的offset出现重叠的问题

```python
from paddlenlp.transformers import AutoTokenizer

tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained("ernie-3.0-base-zh", use_faster=True)
prompt = 'hello'
text = 'This is a test'
result = tokenizer(text=[prompt], 
                   text_pair=[text], 
                   stride=len(prompt), 
                   truncation=True, 
                   max_seq_len=10, 
                   pad_to_max_seq_len=True, 
                   return_attention_mask=True,  
                   return_position_ids=True,  
                   return_dict=False)
offset_mapping = [list(x) for x in result[0]["offset_mapping"]]
bias = 0
for index in range(1, len(offset_mapping)):
    mapping = offset_mapping[index]
    if mapping[0] == 0 and mapping[1] == 0 and bias == 0:
        bias = index
    if mapping[0] == 0 and mapping[1] == 0:
        continue
    offset_mapping[index][0] += bias
    offset_mapping[index][1] += bias
print(offset_mapping)
'''
[[0, 0], [0, 5], [0, 0], [2, 6], [7, 9], [10, 11], [12, 16], [0, 0], [0, 0], [0, 0]]
'''
```
text中第一个token与prompt重叠，正确返回如下

```text
[[0, 0], [0, 5], [0, 0], [6, 10], [11, 13], [14, 15], [16, 20], [0, 0], [0, 0], [0, 0]]
```

title: 借楼请教一下Bert输入问题
body: Bert论文里面写Bert的输入为：词向量、句向量和位置信息三者之和，可是在代码里我们却是将tokenizer的处理结果：input_ids和token_ids输入Bert，请问二者有何关联？

title: paddlenlp 抽取问题
body: 环境如下： paddlepaddle-gpu==2.3.0 paddlenlp==2.3.2 VERSION="18.04.5 LTS (Bionic Beaver) 使用的docker 代码如下： ``` @app.route('/nlp', methods=['post']) def nlp(): body = request.json schema = body.get('schema') keyword = body.get('keyword') if schema is None and keyword is not None: schema = keyword text = body.get('text') if schema is None or text is None: return jsonify({'status': 'false','msg':'keyword or text is not null'}) ie = getTaskflow(schema) return jsonify(ie(text)) def getTaskflow(schema): strSchema = str(''.join(schema)) ie = keyword2TaskflowMap.get(strSchema,None) if ie is None: ie = Taskflow('information_extraction', schema=schema) keyword2TaskflowMap[strSchema] = ie return ie return keyword2TaskflowMap[strSchema] if __name__ == '__main__': PORT = int(os.environ.get('PORT', 32780)) app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=PORT) ``` 通过接口对外暴漏,出现如下一些问题 1. ``` [2022-06-07 12:04:09,269] ERROR in app: Exception on /nlp [POST] Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/flask/app.py", line 2077, in wsgi_app response = self.full_dispatch_request() File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/flask/app.py", line 1525, in         examples['tokens'],

        label_ids += [no_entity_id] * (len(tokenized_inputs['input_ids'][i]) - len(label_ids))

        labels.append(label_ids)
    tokenized_inputs["labels"] = labels
    return tokenized_inputs

title: UIE 用 evaluate.py 和 taskflow 抽取结果不同
body:
paddlenlp 2.3.1, paddlepaddle-gpu 2.3.0.post111
Linux, python 3.6

train.txt (一条)
```json
{"content": "（二）工业和建筑业全年规模以上工业增加值比上年增长11.4%。", "result_list": [], "prompt": "建筑业增加值同比变化百分比"}
```

finetune
```
--num_epochs 1
--seed 0xC7
--valid_steps 1
--model uie-tiny
```

输入训练集的那条数据, 结果 evaluate.py 抽取为空, taskflow 抽取为 '增长11.4%'.

```python
paddlenlp.Taskflow(
        'information_extraction',
        schema=['建筑业增加值同比变化百分比'],
        task_path='./checkpoint/model_best',
        model='uie-tiny'
)
```

evaluate.py 
max_seq_len=512, model='uie-tiny', model_path='./checkpoint/model_best', test_path='./data/train.txt'

title: 基于ERNIE垂直领域二次预训练效果为什么不佳呢？
body:
通过paddlenlp里面的预训练全流程的指引https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/tree/develop/model_zoo/ernie-1.0 ，我在AISTUDIO实现了领域垂类数据的二次预训练：先用
[create_pretraining_data.py](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/develop/model_zoo/ernie-1.0/data_tools/create_pretraining_data.py)处理领域数据，然后使用[run_pretrain.py](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/develop/model_zoo/ernie-1.0/run_pretrain.py)在ernie-1.0-base-zh模型上对领域数据进行二次预训练，最后在领域语料finetune完成NER任务，但效果很不好。在ernie-1.0-base-zh模型下finetune得到的F1为0.7，在二次预训练模型下fintune得到F1为0.2，差距很大：
```shell
python -u  -m paddle.distributed.launch \
    --gpus "0" \
    --log_dir "output/ernie-lib/log" \
    run_pretrain.py \
    --model_type "ernie" \
    --model_name_or_path "ernie-1.0-base-zh" \
    --input_dir "./data" \
    --output_dir "output/ernie-lib" \
    --max_seq_len 512 \
    --micro_batch_size 64 \
    --use_amp true \
    --max_lr 0.0001 \
    --min_lr 0.00001 \
    --max_steps 10000 \
    --save_steps 1000 \
    --checkpoint_steps 1000 \
    --decay_steps 99000 \
    --weight_decay 0.01 \
    --warmup_rate 0.01 \
    --grad_clip 1.0 \
    --logging_freq 20\
    --num_workers 2 \
    --eval_freq 1000 \
    --device "gpu"\
```
以上，请问：
1、这样做的二次预训练模型是在ernie-1.0-base-zh通用模型上对领域数据二次预训练，还是直接对领域数据预训练呢？
2、最后finetune效果没有通用模型好是什么原因呢？数据不够，还是方法不对呢？
3、二次预训练的正确做法是怎样呢？
